root.message: The QUALITY_ASSURE field for indicator 8-7-1, translated into all languages

languages.language: For the collection of data, the methodology of interviews was applied face to face to the households filling out the Bulletin of Households and Bulletin of collective accommodations.
Para a recolha de dados, aplicou-se a metodologia de entrevistas frente a frente aos agregados familiares preenchendo-se o Boletim de Agregados Familiares e Boletim de alojamentos colectivos.
